question: What parts of an animate (tasweer) objects is one not allowed to draw.
answer:
QUESTION
Does it only refer to the eyes or any part of the body. Also, why is it not permissible to draw animate(tasweer) objects. Jazakullah
ANSWER


Share:
The entire head cannot be drawn.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
